review_text: This lotion smells great, all natural and clean. Great size will last awhile - just as long as you need it. I love the packaging also on Zum products, jt‚Äôs aesthetic. Great product not only do I love their soaps I also love the lotions and other products. Refreshing, clean and natural

This hand cream is giving me everything I am looking for: a mild scent, nice rich texture, quick dry time and a great price! I'm not usually into scented lotions, but I made an exception for this almond scent and am so happy I did- I really like the scent- it makes me feel fancy.

Recently I have become very sensitive to moisturizing lotions, but have excessively dry skin especially on my legs.  Very  hard to find one that doesn't cause a bad reaction.  This one is so gentle and nice, very moisturizing, not sticky, makes my legs feel smooth and silky and hydrates very well.

I have pretty dry skin and have been using this cream mainly for hands and feet. It smells yummy when applied and grandually mellows out, so isn't overwhelming. It is nice and creamy, feels good going on, and absorbs fairly quickly, but doesn't really seem to have lasting benefits. I would say it's better than some.

It is a nice light lotion. It's not thick so, it's easy to spread. The scent is a bit strong at first but fades decently fast. 
My only problem was that my skin is very sensitive and my hands didn't agree with this lotion. My skin got very itchy and I had to stop using it as a hand cream - which was my initial intention. 
Otherwise, hydrating deeply with no heaviness to it.
The tube is pretty big too.
A good quality product for bitter almond lovers.
This lotion smells FANTASTIC! It's my new favorite go-to. It is perfect for both hands and body. It also has very good quality ingredients.
Good quality, almond smell, fit for normal and dry  skin, good for more than 10 day‚Äôs vocation, 2 of us  almost emptied it out.
Very natural almond scent, like when you smell the extract right out of the bottle. Non-greasy and easy to spread. So far so good!

I tried the lavender scent which I loved and thought I would try this. The scent is a bit strong as stated in other reviews but does disapate. This reminds me of the old fashion jergens almond lotion but with healthier ingredients and goes on smooth and not greasy.

This is a nice quality lotion that smells great. However the fragrance does not last as much as I would like. I use it as a hand lotion before I go to bed and it works really well. I don't use it as often as a daytime lotion, because it leaves my hands feeling a bit sticky.
I really like this company's soaps, so I thought I would try this product. The ingredients are very good, but the scent is a bit strong for me. Fairly moisturizing, just ok.
Really nice, quality product. So happy I can source this from iHerb!
This has truly clean ingredients. And it‚Äôs affordable. I like the smell.
Smells amazing and has a scent that lasts. It moisturizes well and is not sticky. The packaging is good as well. Will repurchase.
I love this this Zum product. Great ingredients and long lasting moisturizer. The smell is fantastic.

This is the only 1 star I have ever left on Iherb out of hundreds of reviews. First of all the consistency is runny. Then the overwhelming smell of imitation almond scent hits you (a cheap overly sweet cherry scent). Next is the sticky, tacky film it leaves on your hands especially between your fingers, love that. And just when you think this product was just bad - there's not a hint of moisture to be had.  Sorry for the bad review, but I look forward to honesty when I'm reading them and looking for some guidance before a blind purchase. Hope this helps üôè
I'ts very smooth and creamy adn the almond scent is nice.
Smells really nice and very moisturizing. I use this brand a lot and love it!
The smell is amazing and refreshing. Great size tube. great quality brand. Lasting moisture.
I love this stuff. My skin stays moisturized for a long time. The almond scent is strong but doesn‚Äôt linger more than 15 min.
I'm always searching for a hand lotion cream that has the fewest chemicals and organic ingredients as possible. This one is one of the better ones.
Wanted to love it, Ingredients are good but I can‚Äôt stand the way it smells on my skin after the artificial sharp almond note quickly fades, it smells like play dough.
Pretty moisturizing but still light. The almond scent smells just like almond extract. I love that it‚Äôs vegan & cruelty free.

I already had this product from this very good brand in another perfume (myrrh) and I wanted to test another perfume from this very good brand which makes body care products with a remarkable composition. I find that the almond scent is very strong upon application but then it fades. I'm going to order some without fragrance (neutral).

Speaking of the ZUM series, it's all about fragrance. This is an almond scent that smells a little alcoholic, but the almond scent isn't too sweet. It tastes like almond tofu. It's a body cream that feels a little thicker than creamy, and although it has a similar scent, I think it's suitable for winter.

When I opened the lid and smelled it, it had a sweet almond scent. I thought it would be good for winter, so I tried putting a small amount on my arm, and it had a strong alcohol-like pungent scent. Where was the almond scent from before?! I was surprised. It was more like paint thinner than alcohol. I wondered if I was the only one who got something strange, so I went to look at the reviews and found that there were other people who also wrote that it smelled like alcohol, so I thought maybe I didn't get a bad one. What kind of scent is this? I couldn't figure it out even after looking at the ingredients. I was worried, is it okay to wear it? The texture is loose and easy to apply, but it leaves a lot of oil on the skin and makes it sticky. I think it's good for winter.
I bought this as a replacement for hand cream. It's a large size and good value for money. It's a light flavor, so it might not be suitable for those who like rich flavors.

The first taste is a slightly spicy almond flavor, which is very good. The aftertaste is... oil smoke, which is surprising. The texture is oily and absorbs well. I usually need to wipe off the excess oil with a paper towel. I've always liked ZUM's fragrances, but not this one.
The smell is not nice. I didn't like it. It's overwhelming. It moisturizes well, but I didn't like the smell. Should I use it for my manhood or leave it on?
Very good moisturizer, does not irritate the skin, smells good, size is large, high quality
The aroma, moisturizing and nourishing of the skin are excellent. I highly recommend it, despite the high price.
The best of the best. And the composition and smell and texture and volume.
The ingredients are good in size and are still being tested. Try a daily moisturizing routine
The texture is light, non-sticky, and highly malleable. It can be used all year round in Taiwan.

Sweet, I liked it, but it is not wow, but it is suitable for daily use. There is no strong grill smell. The care is sweet. It refreshes, but if it smells. Benefits. Moisturizes the hand. My daily routine. Feels like moisturizing. The quality is sweet. The size is appropriate for the age of 25 above the packaging. The benefit is perfect. Its composition is very good. It has benefits after continuing. It does not cause sensitivity for me. Gentle, repeat twice to once. No There are concerns
It has a slight smell of almonds and what is important really moisturizes the skin of the hands and body.
